source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_00<tab>Every successful adventurer plays to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> strength, and you have some inkling of what Aganbold's might be after a few commissions in his stead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_00<tab>レヴナンツトールのアガンボルドは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_01<tab>According to the smooth-talking Aganbold, the mare's tail root is a field physick that every adventurer should carry. Since neither he nor you have any on hand, it would be best for you to go west into the Tangle and bring back eight roots.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_01<tab>タングル湿林に自生している「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877C01 /var>」は、薬として大変役に立つものだという。レヴナンツトールの西、タングル湿林で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877C01 /var>」を8つほど入手してこよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_02<tab>You locate the mare's tail, and harvest eight roots. The flesh has a pleasant, spicy scent to it; you can well believe it would make a soothing concoction, to the senses at least. As for the festering...end your wool-gathering and speak with Aganbold.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877C01 /var>を入手した。レヴナンツトールに戻って「アガンボルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the roots to Aganbold and escape further work by declining to take your share of the harvest. Uncharitable it may be, but you suspect that Aganbold has cozened you into performing another commission for him...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_SEQ_03<tab>アガンボルドに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E877C01 /var>を渡した。彼は冒険者の協力に感謝しているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Sister)) ((Brother)) /var>, can you spare some mare's tail roots? I've none on account of those young cadgers from the Black Shroud. I told them, “The root tea'll settle that belly of yours,” and the next thing, I've given them all I have!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_000湿林に自生する「」は、
煎じて飲めば腹下しに効き、傷に塗れば化のう止めになる。
ここらの冒険者必携の、ありがたい万能薬ってわけさ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_001<tab>You don't have any either? Why, every adventurer working these parts ought to carry some with them! A poultice of mare's tail keeps wounds from festering, and you look a festering sort of <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((fellow)) /var> if ever I saw one.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_001普段は俺も切らさないように持ち歩いているんだが、
この間、聖コイナク調査団で仕事を請け負った際に、
仲間に分けてやったら、手持ちが少なくなっちまってな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_002<tab>Since we're both short, how about you go and get us some? Eight roots should do it, I'd say.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_002お前、よければ採ってきてくれないか？
「」を8つほどだ。
よろしく頼んだぜ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_020<tab>There you are, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>! Got what we need?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_020よう、あんた。
頼んでいたものは採ってきてくれたかい？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_030<tab>One, two...seven and eight. Now, they'll need to be prepared and seeing as how we're both─are you fair certain? You'll want one when that festering starts. Well, if you say so. I'll keep the lot, and much appreciate the kindness!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC511_00999_AGANBOLD_000_030……そう、これだ。
この辺りを根城にする冒険者にゃ、こいつは必需品さ。
ありがとうよ、助かったぜ。
